title: Sieve of Atkin
subtitle: Efficient prime number sieve using quadratic forms and modulo operations

additional_information: Sieve of Atkin is a modern prime sieve algorithm faster than Sieve of Eratosthenes for large limits, using modulo properties and quadratic forms to mark primes.
